html: My deepest condolences to Senator Richard Lugar’s family, staff and friends. Today many around the world acknowledge his work on foreign policy like his achievements on nuclear security. I was honored to be recognized by @TheLugarCenter Bipartisan Index top 25 for 2 years.

html: It’s painful to see how the Maduro regime has forced thousands of Venezuelans, including women & children, to cross the border into Colombia every day to meet their basic needs, like food & medicine. Experiencing this firsthand doesn’t come close to what we see in the press.pic.twitter.com/o4JQvrhooJ
text: It’s painful to see how the Maduro regime has forced thousands of Venezuelans, including women & children, to cross the border into Colombia every day to meet their basic needs, like food & medicine. Experiencing this firsthand doesn’t come close to what we see in the press.pic.twitter.com/o4JQvrhooJ

html: At the Colombian border with Venezuela, I visited a humanitarian aid center where help from the U.S., including #PuertoRico, and other countries is received. The hunger and need experienced by our Venezuelan brothers and sisters is unprecedented and heartbreaking.pic.twitter.com/V3HH2cC2Ex
text: At the Colombian border with Venezuela, I visited a humanitarian aid center where help from the U.S., including #PuertoRico, and other countries is received.  The hunger and need experienced by our Venezuelan brothers and sisters is unprecedented and heartbreaking.pic.twitter.com/V3HH2cC2Ex

html: The Canõ Martín Peña Ecosystem Restoration Project is one of the U.S. ARMY Corps of Engineers projects that remains a priority. For decades, the community has struggled with frequent flooding resulting from debris and wastewater accumulation in the channel.pic.twitter.com/4Gxa2XhAX1
text: The Canõ Martín Peña Ecosystem Restoration Project is one of the U.S. ARMY Corps of Engineers projects that remains a priority. For decades, the community has struggled with frequent flooding resulting from debris and wastewater accumulation in the channel.pic.twitter.com/4Gxa2XhAX1

html: With hurricane season upon us, I asked PREPA CEO Jose Ortiz what efforts are taking place to accelerate building a resilient electricity system capable to withstand a future storm or worse.pic.twitter.com/IWZZuJkcNJ

html: In 2018, Congress allocated $2 billion to improve #PuertoRico's grid. However, to date, that money has not been disbursed. Hurricane season is just 53 days away. It's vital this funding gets to the Island. I will be asking about its status and how to accelerate its disbursement.pic.twitter.com/wRqXiuKlHY
text: In 2018, Congress allocated $2 billion to improve #PuertoRico's grid. However, to date, that money has not been disbursed. Hurricane season is just 53 days away. I will work with all Members to accomplish this for the people I proudly represent.pic.twitter.com/D8DKcrRLMO

html: For more than a century the people of #PuertoRico have been U.S. citizens, but has been denied the right to vote for the President and members of Congress, leaving us without representation in the federal government, which enact the laws that rule the land.pic.twitter.com/J7UYcON7K7
text: For more than a century the people of #PuertoRico have been U.S. citizens, but has been denied the right to vote for the President and members of Congress, leaving us without representation in the federal government, which enact the laws that rule the land.pic.twitter.com/J7UYcON7K7

html: Good news! The $600 million NAP disaster recovery funds are included in the Senate’s disaster bill. I have been advocating for increased funding since last Congress. This now brings us closer to providing food security for over 1.3 million NAP participants on the Island.

html: De 56 cotorras puertorriqueñas silvestres que habitaban en El Yunque, solo 2 sobrevivieron a los huracanes Irma y María. text:
De 56 cotorras puertorriqueñas silvestres que habitaban en El Yunque, solo 2 sobrevivieron a los huracanes Irma y María.

El Programa de Recuperación de la Cotorra Puertorriqueña busca conservar, proteger y administrar esta especie ante su amenaza de peligro de extinción.pic.twitter.com/CAM3nobZjw

html: Only 2 of 56 wild Puerto Rican parrots living in El Yunque survived hurricanes Irma and María. The Puerto Rican Parrot Recovery program seeks to conserve, protect and manage wild and captive parrots in order to eventually downlist the species from endangered to threatened.pic.twitter.com/twQ75cAbIm
text:
Only 2 of 56 wild Puerto Rican parrots living in El Yunque survived hurricanes Irma and María.

The Puerto Rican Parrot Recovery program seeks to conserve, protect and manage wild and captive parrots in order to eventually downlist the species from endangered to threatened.pic.twitter.com/twQ75cAbIm

html: El Yunque es el único bosque tropical lluvioso en el sistema forestal nacional. Con casi 29,000 acres, es uno de los más pequeños en tamaño, pero uno de los de mayor diversidad de especies de animales y plantas, y de las cuales algunas solo se encuentran aquí.pic.twitter.com/Uwg1lrCJUe
text: El Yunque es el único bosque tropical lluvioso en el sistema forestal nacional. Con casi 29,000 acres, es uno de los más pequeños en tamaño, pero uno de los de mayor diversidad de especies de animales y plantas, y de las cuales algunas solo se encuentran aquí.pic.twitter.com/Uwg1lrCJUe

html: El Yunque National Forest is the only tropical rain forest in the national forest system. At nearly 29,000 acres, it is one of the smallest in size, yet one of the most biologically diverse, hosting hundreds of animal and plant species, some of which are only found here.pic.twitter.com/LpxaPKvvhI
text: El Yunque National Forest is the only tropical rain forest in the national forest system. At nearly 29,000 acres, it is one of the smallest in size, yet one of the most biologically diverse, hosting hundreds of animal and plant species, some of which are only found here.pic.twitter.com/LpxaPKvvhI

html: El Yunque was severely affected by the hurricane. Today I had the privilege of helping reforestation efforts by planting an Ortegón tree, endemic of #PuertoRico. Rare to find and always near rivers.pic.twitter.com/uMgW9oRU3d

html: The CTC helps lift families out of poverty. Congress recognized this fact when it passed and doubled this privilege under the The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act in 2018. It is time that we expand the same benefit to #PuertoRico where families who have 1 or 2 children don’t qualify. #SOTU
text: The CTC helps lift families out of poverty. Congress recognized this fact when it passed and doubled this privilege under the The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act in 2018. It is time that we expand the same benefit to #PuertoRico where families who have 1 or 2 children don’t qualify. #SOTU

html: Today, I filed HR947, a bipartisan bill to make SSI extensive to the Americans in Puerto Rico and the other territories who are currently suffering this unequal and indignant treatment. This bill is a temporary fix; the only true, permanent solution is Statehood.
text: Today, I filed HR947, a bipartisan bill to make SSI extensive to the Americans in Puerto Rico and the other territories who are currently suffering this unequal and indignant treatment. This bill is a temporary fix; the only true, permanent solution is Statehood.

html: Discrimination in SSI affects the most poor and vulnerable of our citizens the elderly, the blind, & the disabled
text: Discrimination in SSI affects the most poor and vulnerable of our citizens the elderly, the blind, & the disabled

html: I welcome Judge Gelpí’s decision, which sheds light on how our territorial status allows our residents to be turned into second class citizens merely because of where they live.
text: I welcome Judge Gelpí’s decision, which sheds light on how our territorial status allows our residents to be turned into second class citizens merely because of where they live.

html: An American living under the poverty line in the continental United States is no more needy, vulnerable, or deserving of assistance than an American living under the poverty line in Puerto Rico.https://twitter.com/RepJenniffer/status/1092484571495567360 …
text:
An American living under the poverty line in the continental United  
States is no more needy, vulnerable, or deserving of assistance than an American living under the poverty  
line in Puerto Rico.https://twitter.com/RepJenniffer/status/1092484571495567360 …

html: Of all the disparities that Americans living in Puerto Rico face, none is as shocking to the conscience as the disparity in the assistance available to the most vulnerable citizens, people who under no circumstance can support themselves.
text: Of all the disparities that Americans living in Puerto Rico face, none is as shocking to the conscience as the disparity in the assistance available to the most vulnerable citizens, people who under no circumstance can support themselves.

html: I introduced an amendment to add disaster relief funding for Puerto Rico to the government funding bill. Thank you @RepJenniffer for your leadership in the House. Puerto Rico’s success is America’s success. And Puerto Rico’s recovery is America’s recovery. Read more here:pic.twitter.com/6f0s2YArzr
text:
I introduced an amendment to add disaster relief funding for Puerto Rico to the government funding bill. Thank you @RepJenniffer for your leadership in the House.

Puerto Rico’s success is America’s success. And Puerto Rico’s recovery is America’s recovery.

Read more here:pic.twitter.com/6f0s2YArzr

html: Decir que los $600 millones en fondos adicionales para el Programa del PAN en Puerto Rico – una asignación que tiene apoyo bipartita en el Congreso – son “excesivos e innecesarios” es erróneo y le hace un flaco servicio a los 3.2 millones de ciudadanos americanos en la Isla.pic.twitter.com/tnOAtUuOgH
text: Decir que los $600 millones en fondos adicionales para el Programa del PAN en Puerto Rico – una asignación que tiene apoyo bipartita en el Congreso – son “excesivos e innecesarios” es erróneo y le hace un flaco servicio a los 3.2 millones de ciudadanos americanos en la Isla.pic.twitter.com/tnOAtUuOgH

html: To characterize the additional $600 million for Puerto Rico’s Nutrition Assistance Program (PAN, in Spanish) – an allocation that has broad, bipartisan support in Congress – as “excessive and unnecessary” is mistaken and a disservice to the 3.2 million Americans on the Island.pic.twitter.com/lnJiOo0SKI
text: To characterize the additional $600 million for Puerto Rico’s Nutrition Assistance Program (PAN, in Spanish) – an allocation that has broad, bipartisan support in Congress – as “excessive and unnecessary” is mistaken and a disservice to the 3.2 million Americans on the Island.pic.twitter.com/lnJiOo0SKI

html: Puerto Rico has 280,000 Medicare Advantage (MA) enrollees, equal to the 97% of all DUALS. My amendment proposes changes to mitigate the increasing disparity when using the unique and deficient fee-for-service Medicare program in Puerto Rico as the basis for MA rates.
text: Puerto Rico has 280,000 Medicare Advantage (MA) enrollees, equal to the 97% of all DUALS. My amendment proposes changes to mitigate the increasing disparity when using the unique and deficient fee-for-service Medicare program in Puerto Rico as the basis for MA rates.

html: My fourth amendment creates a set-aside for the territories and non-contiguous states affected by natural disasters in 2017 & 2018. This will address the high cost of construction due and will provide more infrastructure funding to address increased costs.
text: My fourth amendment creates a set-aside for the territories and non-contiguous states affected by natural disasters in 2017 & 2018. This will address the high cost of construction due and will provide more infrastructure funding to address increased costs.

html: Puerto Rico has had billions of dollars appropriated for disaster relief but those funds have been slow to get where they need to be. My amendment is intended to create transparency of Federal Disaster Funds.
text: Puerto Rico has had billions of dollars appropriated for disaster relief but those funds have been slow to get where they need to be. My amendment is intended to create transparency of Federal Disaster Funds.

html: Census reports 95% of the island as low-income but this data reported is from years before Hurricanes Irma and Maria hit Puerto Rico. My amendment provides that Puerto Rico shall be certified and designated as an Opportunity Zone in its entirety.
text: Census reports 95% of the island as low-income but this data reported is from years before Hurricanes Irma and Maria hit Puerto Rico. My amendment provides that Puerto Rico shall be certified and designated as an Opportunity Zone in its entirety.

html: As Puerto Rico is projected to hit a #Medicaid Cliff, I asked Rules Committee to increase Medicaid funds available to the Island for fiscal years 2020 and 2021.

text: Since the 2002 Farm Bill, Congress has included the very same wording of the Animal Welfare Act.  In other words, cockfighting is prohibited in the United States but is legal if the state or territory regulated the event and the bird is not in interstate commerce.pic.twitter.com/zyYuUQQVDp

html: Today we mourn the passing and celebrate the life of President George H.W. Bush, a patriot & model public servant whose legacy will not be forgotten. I am honored that in the next Congress I will serve from 1609 LHOB, the same office he had as a member of the House #Remembering41

html: Nos unimos al duelo nacional por la pérdida del pres. George H. W. Bush. html: La población del Fuerte Buchanan está compuesta de 6,706 soldados, entre reservistas y a tiempo completo; cerca de 15,000 miembros activos, reservistas adicionales y de la Guardia Nacional; sobre 116,029 retirados en necesidad de servicios y cerca de 200,000 veteranos.pic.twitter.com/89b59sQ98R

html: Los oficiales del Ft Buchanan tienen en planes la construcción de una nueva clínica, el edificio actual fue construido para la década de 1940 y necesita mejoras para poder proveerle mejores servicios a la población del Fuerte.pic.twitter.com/SFEv3WgXHo
text:
Los oficiales del Ft Buchanan tienen
en planes la construcción de una nueva clínica, el edificio actual fue construido para la década de 1940 y necesita mejoras para poder proveerle mejores servicios a la población del Fuerte.pic.twitter.com/SFEv3WgXHo
